title: GDP Growth from 2000-2022
text: This project is about the dynamic concepts of economics, to chart the course of global GDP growth rates from the years 1999 to 2022. Because of RStudio, it is possible to transform raw data into a narrative that reflects past economic trends, as well as help in forecasting future possibilities. The graph below is a visualizations which brings clarity to economics that may seem complex, making them accessible to anyone. The countries with the highest change in GDP over the last 20 years are China and the United States.

title: About
text:
My name is Kushal Kanuparthi, and I have always been amazed by the possibilities of computers, whether it’s through 3D Design, robotics, or even, coding.
My GitHub Profile: https://github.com/KushalK-dev
My email: kushal.kanuparthi@gmail.com
This project is about the change in GDP of major countries from the years 2000 to 2022, which is graphed onto a line plot.
This project was created as a part of Kane’s Data Science Bootcamp.
